summary: It is a Glowing eyes version of rAWR - Asjure's Werewolves Redone by Asjure.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]It is a Glowing eyes version of rAWR - Asjure's Werewolves Redone by Asjure.  I will update as soon as  Asjure updates his/her mod. I only tested it by using Nsjones's eyes from Moonlight tales. It has the black werewolf skin from Bellyaches Creatures Pack.  If you want to change the textures, download Bellyaches Creatures Pack. The more glowing eyes in the pictures are Nsjones's eyes. The Nsjones eyes are not in the mod.

If you have moonlight tales installed, you can replace the vanilla meshes with this by renaming Werewolf_Vanilla. There is a problem with the different eyes is that the right eye or the left eye(i can't remember) will overwrite the opposite eye.

The orignal mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56730
Link to bellyaches: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3621/?

[/size] Asjure for the mesh
 bellyache for the Textures
author: Asjure

files.name: Asjure's Werewolves Redone Glowing eyes v0.2
